claim: In Hey Arnold, one of the characters stayed on a porch all the time.

supporting.text: Stinky Peterson is a character in Hey Arnold who is frequently seen sitting on his porch, as it is his usual spot in the neighborhood.

attacks.text: Stinky Peterson is a character in Hey Arnold who is frequently seen sitting on his porch, as it is his usual spot in the neighborhood.
While Stinky is often on his porch, there are episodes where he is seen elsewhere in the neighborhood or at school.
Stinky's porch appearances are consistent enough to establish it as his primary or iconic location in the series.

supporting.text: The show Hey Arnold often depicts Stinky on his porch, reinforcing the idea that he is a character who stays there regularly.

attacks.text: The show Hey Arnold often depicts Stinky on his porch, reinforcing the idea that he is a character who stays there regularly.
While Stinky is often shown on his porch, this does not necessarily mean he 'stays there all the time,' as he is also seen in other locations throughout the show.
Episodes like 'Stinky's Pumpkin' and 'Stinky's Big Move' show Stinky actively leaving his porch for significant events, contradicting the idea of him staying there constantly.

supporting.text: Stinky's porch is a recurring setting in the show, indicating that he spends a significant amount of time there.

attacks.text: Stinky's porch is a recurring setting in the show, indicating that he spends a significant amount of time there.
Recurring setting does not necessarily imply constant presence; characters may visit frequently without staying all the time.
Episodes often show Stinky engaging in activities outside his porch, contradicting the idea he stays there all the time.
Other characters like Helga are also frequently shown on stoops, diluting the uniqueness of Stinky's porch presence.
The show's narrative structure focuses on neighborhood interactions, making porches naturally recurring settings for multiple characters.

supporting.text: In multiple episodes of Hey Arnold, Stinky is shown interacting with other characters from his porch, suggesting it is his habitual location.

attacks.text: In multiple episodes of Hey Arnold, Stinky is shown interacting with other characters from his porch, suggesting it is his habitual location.
Stinky is also frequently shown in other locations, such as school and the football field, indicating the porch is not his only habitual location.
The porch scenes are more memorable due to their unique setting, creating a false impression of frequency.
Other characters like Mr. Hyunh are more consistently associated with specific locations (his apartment window).
Production notes confirm the porch was intentionally used as Stinky's characteristic background.

supporting.text: The character Stinky is known for his laid-back personality, which aligns with the idea of him staying on his porch often.

attacks.text: The character Stinky is known for his laid-back personality, which aligns with the idea of him staying on his porch often.
Stinky is often seen playing with his friends or engaging in activities outside his porch in the show.
While Stinky is laid-back, there is no explicit scene or dialogue confirming he 'stays on his porch all the time.'
Other characters like Mr. Hyunh are shown spending more time on their porches than Stinky.
